title: Scenic - Fragment, 1868–69
creditline: Gift of the Jefferson County Chapter, Association for the Preservation of Tennessee Antiquities
description: Small fragment, featuring one spindly tree, along with one branch of a bush bearing red flowers, scenic landscape in greens, with orange sky.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scenic - Fragment, 1868–69.
1868–69. Hand painted. Gift of the Jefferson County Chapter, Association for the Preservation of Tennessee Antiquities. 1971-64-10.
